DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - To assess effect specific combination nutritional capsule contain curcumin , green tea extract , Polygonum cuspidatum extract , soybean extract specific biomarker relevance oxidative stress ( NF-κB ) . - To estimate mean change blood lymphocyte NF-κB level 2 week consumption nutritional agent study . OUTLINE : Participants receive oral curcumin/green tea extract/Polygonum cuspidatum extract/soybean extract capsule twice daily 2 week . Participants ask keep pill diary track compliance . Blood urine sample collect participant baseline completion study . Lymphocytes serum blood sample isolate analyzed NF-κB biomarker level . Urine sample also test oxidative stress marker level . Samples analyze use electrophoretic mobility shift assay ( EMSA ) .
